nodes.text: The Qel-Droma family was a Force-sensitive Human bloodline from Alderaan that had produced a number of powerful Jedi warriors in the era of the Old Sith Wars. Of the three known members, only Ulic Qel-Droma ever turned to the dark side. Lien-Tsai Qel-Droma, the mother of Ulic and his brother Cay, was also a Jedi Knight.
The Alderaanian frigate Qel-Droma was presumably named after a member of this family.
Sedriss QL (born Qaga Lok), Military Executor to the reborn Palpatine was a distant descendant of Ulic Qel-Droma.
